biotools.summary: BigTop is a 3D reality tool for GWAS visualization. It demonstrates some of the potential of virtual reality for scientific visualization by providing an easy way for scientists and science enthusiasts to become immersed in their data. This provides several key advantages over more traditional 2D visualization methods.
